TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UploadDataCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 클래스의 인스턴스는에 전달 되는 합니다.Instances of this class are passed to the . ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에서는 비동기적으로 업로드 데이터를 보여 줍니다.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading data. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#34)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#34)] 다음 메서드는 업로드가 완료 될 때 호출 됩니다.The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As Byte()
public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Result { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 메서드를 호출하여 시작된 데이터 업로드 작업에 대한 서버 회신을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets the server reply to a data upload operation started by calling an method.
A array containing the server reply.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 확인 해야는 및 이 속성에서 반환 되는 데이터를 사용 하기 전에 속성입니다.You should check the and properties before using the data returned by this property. 경우는 속성의 값은는 개체 또는 속성의 값은 `true`, 비동기 작업이 제대로 완료 되지 않았습니다 고 속성의 값을 유효 하지 않게 됩니다.If the property's value is an object or the property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the property's value will not be valid. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에서는이 속성의 값을 표시합니다.The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#35)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#35)]
